channel.title: Story on M5E's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Story on M5E's Blog

item.title: The Workhorse Group Story
item.description: The Workhorse Group Incorporated is a EV company which primarily produces delivery vans and got lately popular with a rising share price because it was viewed as one of the possible winners of an 8 billion USPS contract to replace old delivery vans. This contract busted, however I started writing this article before the deal busted - so don’t be surprised by the high numbers. I owned this stock for several years and wanna display my view of the company in this blog post.
